programme.sub-title: Thomas Gets it Right/What’s the Matter with Henry/As Good as Gordon

programme.desc: Thomas has to move stinky fish, Skarloey is given a fright and Emily has an urgent job.

programme.sub-title: Halloween/Trusty Rusty/You Can Do It, Toby!

programme.desc: Thomas has two jobs, Arthur is put to work and an unusual new engine arrives on Sodor.
